title: 2015 World Rugby Nations Cup
text:
The 2015 <a href="World%20Rugby%20Nations%20Cup">World Rugby Nations Cup</a> was the tenth edition of the international <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> tournament, a competition created by the <a href="World%20Rugby">World Rugby</a>. For the ninth time in a row, it was held at the <a href="Stadionul%20Arcul%20de%20Triumf">Stadionul Naţional de Rugby</a> in <a href="Bucharest">Bucharest</a>, <a href="Romania">Romania</a>, and was played between 12 and 21 June, running alongside <a href="2015%20World%20Rugby%20Tbilisi%20Cup">2015 World Rugby Tbilisi Cup</a> in <a href="Georgia%20%28country%29">Georgia</a>.
, the hosts, were joined by <a href="European%20Nations%20Cup%20%28rugby%20union%29">ENC</a> side and Argentina A side, <a href="Argentina%20Jaguars">Argentina Jaguars</a>, while returned for the first time since 2011, as they and Romania prepare to participate in the <a href="2015%20Rugby%20World%20Cup">2015 Rugby World Cup</a>.
Hosts Romania won the tournament, for the first time since 2013, with three from three victories.
Fixtures.
The fixtures were announced on 1 May 2015.
